name: Headset Checks
description: Jedi at Luke AFB created a breadboard where pilots can test headset functionality upon checkout instead of in cockpit; cuts 45 min delays that occurred in 1 out of every 19 F-16 and F-35 weekly training sorties.

name: Sharkhead Lazer Trailer
